author: CBS News
title: Oil price war and virus a "double whammy" for Texas city
description: A key benchmark determining crude oil prices fell below zero​ for the first time ever Monday.
content:
With people staying home and not traveling during the coronavirus pandemic, the demand for oil has plummeted. A key benchmark determining crude oil prices fell below zero for the first time ever Monday.
Low oil prices can be disastrous for regions that rely … [+2110 chars]
